content: उपांगः A mark of sandal on the forehead. --गं {@--1@} A subdivision, a subhead. {@--2@} Any minor limb or member (of anything); वर्गाः… सांगोपांगैरिहोदिताः <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--3@} A supplement of a supplement. {@--4@} A supplementary work (of inferior value). {@--5@} A secondary portion of science; a class of writings supplementary to the Vedāṅgas; (these are four: --पुराणन्यायमीमांसाधर्मशास्त्राणि).
